message: This file is no longer used for homepage content. Homepage content (hero slides, artisanal roots text, etc.) is now managed in the Supabase 'site_configurations' table with config_key 'homepageContent'. Please refer to your Supabase dashboard or the admin panel at /admin/content/homepage to manage this content. Initial default data can be set via the admin panel save action if no entry exists in Supabase.
